name: Child's Play
summary_text: At an exclusive boys' school, a new gym teacher is drawn into a feud between two older instructors, and he discovers that everything at the school is not quite as staid, tranquil and harmless as it seems.

name: Dash Akol
summary_text: Dash Akol is greatly respected in Shiraz as an honorable man who has lost his family's money through helping his friends. He has an enemy, however, named Kaka Rostam, a mean and spiteful ...                See full summary »

name: The Chairman
summary_text: During the Chinese Cultural Revolution, the US government sends a scientist to China to steal the formula for a new agricultural enzyme developed by the Chinese.

name: Trapped
summary_text: Secret Service agents make a deal with a counterfeiting inmate to be released on early parole if he will help them recover some bogus moneymaking plates, but he plans to double cross them.

name: Run the Tide
summary_text: When their drug abusing mother is released from prison determined to rebuild their family, Rey kidnaps his younger brother Oliver and escapes their desert home for the California coast.

name: Entre Nós
summary_text: A group of literature-loving friends bury letters to be opened 10 years later when they will confront the dreams of their youth with what the future has held in store for them.

name: Man Madar Hastam
summary_text: Ava is sentenced to capital punishment for the murder of saeed, the friend of his father and her lover who had raped her.

name: Siccin 6
summary_text: A girl is haunted by an evil spirit in her family home. Several bad things begin to happen around her house and to her family members. An old character rises back and tries to save the family from their doomed fate.

name: Mumbai Express
summary_text: A bike rider and three small-time crooks kidnap a rich man's son for a huge ransom. But they soon discover that they have the wrong boy who is the illegitimate son of a police officer.

name: Someone Special
summary_text: A struggling for love, Baseball players discovers he has terminal illness and meets a girl who has had a crush on him since times immemorial. The twists and turns of events bring them together.

name: The Shadow Men
summary_text: After a family has an alien encounter, they call the Air Force to report the incident which leads to a visit by Men In Black, who turn out to be alien-human mutants.

name: She Cried No
summary_text: A college freshman is date-raped at her brother's frat party by a fraternity member.

name: Es ist nicht leicht ein Gott zu sein
summary_text: Another planet in the period of medieval times. An employee of the institute of experimental history from Earth, who is send under the name of noble don Rumata of Estor as a spy with a ...                See full summary »

name: Rude Boy
summary_text: A young British punk and roadie for The Clash navigates life in socially torn 1970s England.

name: The Magnetic Monster
summary_text: The Office of Scientific Investigation sends A-Men agents to investigate reports of unusual magnetic activity in various communities.

name: The Miracle of Our Lady of Fatima
summary_text: In 1917, three shepherd children living just outside Fatima, Portugal have visions of a lovely lady in a cloud. The anticlerical government wishes to squelch the Church; reports of ...                See full summary »

name: Hürkus
summary_text: Vecihi Hurkus is undoubtedly one of the most important figures of Turkish aviation history. Hurkus who lived between the years 1896-1969, is the first aircraft designer and manufacturer of ...                See full summary »

name: Damat Takimi
summary_text: Yigit, Omer, Serdar, Onat and Can are five friends who have never left since high school. The group, which still sees themselves as children, realizes that Yigit's marriage decision and his...                See full summary »

name: Christmas in the Air
summary_text: Struggling to find balance in his life, widowed father of two Robert Trent seeks the help of professional organizer Lydia Evans to prepare for a big meeting and holiday dinner with a potential client, while making time for his children.

name: Ulysses: A Dark Odyssey
summary_text: United States of Europe is established 2020. Back from war in the Middle East, amnesiac Ulysses goes thru a lot in Taurus City, a dictatorship, looking for his wife, Penelope.

name: Reset
summary_text: When her son is kidnapped, the inventor of a time machine teams up with multiple versions of her future self to rescue him.

name: Storm Rider
summary_text: When her father is put into jail, the spoiled teenager Dani loses everything. Forced to live with her uncle Sam on a farm without horses to ride and to train a sad Dani takes care of a young mule and learns what really counts.

name: De toutes nos forces
summary_text: Julien dreams of adventure. But when you live in a wheelchair, such dreams are difficult to fulfill. To do so, Julien challenges his father to compete with him in the "Ironman" triathlon in...                See full summary »

name: Brightest Star
summary_text: After the heartbreaking end of his first love, a recent college graduate sets out to win back the girl of his dreams only to discover a greater journey awaits him.

name: Love Begins
summary_text: A traveling man (Wes Brown) falls in love with a woman (Julie Mond) who runs a farm with her sister.

name: Grassroots
summary_text: After losing his job, a journalist reluctantly agrees to help his oddball friend with his bid to earn a seat on the Seattle City Council.

name: Natale in crociera
summary_text: Paolo Cioffa, as Christmas approaches, is ready to leave on a cruise with his mistress Magda Venni, freed by his wife Francesca Zanchi and his son Federico, who is about to go skiing.

name: Ramji Londonwaley
summary_text: A small-town cook moves to London to earn a living, but from his employer's sudden death to the immigration officials on his trail, plans soon go sour.

name: Midnight in Saint Petersburg
summary_text: In this globe-trotting political thriller, a former MI5 agent (screen legend Michael Caine), now running a PI company, takes a job to recover a consignment of stolen plutonium in Saint Petersburg.

name: My Name Is Bill W.
summary_text: The story of Bill Wilson and the founding of Alcoholics Anonymous.

name: Who Are You, Polly Maggoo?
summary_text: A model tells a television crew about her dreams of a life with Prince Charming while she is fending off the lecherous advances of a horde of men.

name: Selah and the Spades
summary_text: Five factions run the underground life of Haldwell School, a prestigious east coast boarding school. At the head of the most powerful faction - The Spades - sits Selah Summers, walking the fine line between being feared and loved.

name: So-gong-nyeo
summary_text: Whiskey and cigarettes, the only ways of keeping her dignity in this city.

name: Ashghal haye Doost Dashtani
summary_text: It is about a family who one night got the opportunity to solve their mother's problem.

name: Bornless Ones
summary_text: With the help of her friends, Emily moves to a remote home to take better care of her brother, Zack who is diagnosed with cerebral palsy. But what they don't know is that the house kept a terrifying secret that will haunt them one by one.

name: Fiore
summary_text: Youth detention centre. Daphne, arrested for theft, falls in love with Josh, who is also a young robber. Men and women can not meet in jail and love is forbidden. Daphne and Josh's ...                See full summary »

name: Slash
summary_text: Freshman Neil's Vanguard stories are all he cares about...until he meets the older Julia, who pushes him to put his own fan fic online. When the website's moderator takes a special interest in Neil's work, it opens up a whole new universe.

name: Bir Varmis Bir Yokmus
summary_text: One night, Nehir (Melisa Sozen) comes across to someone singing songs all night long. She likes what she listens so much that she goes after this mysterious musician.

name: Kazoku wa tsuraiyo
summary_text: For her birthday, the grandma of a traditional Tokyo family asks her apathetic husband a gift: divorce. This shocks not only the incredulous husband, but the whole family, and they all will try to prevent the catastrophe at any cost.

name: Kristin's Christmas Past
summary_text: Given the opportunity to visit her estranged family on Christmas Eve 1996, Kristin Cartwright hopes to change her past in order to improve her current life in 2013.

name: Volchok
summary_text: There are two of them: a mother and a girl. They have no names. And they are in a constant run. The mother runs away from the daughter in an attempt to start new life, and the girl runs ...                See full summary »

name: On the 12th Date of Christmas
summary_text: Two game creators, both vying for a promotion, must team up to create a Christmas scavenger hunt.

name: A (Ad Infinitum)
summary_text: The film opens with a man getting rescued by an NGO fifty-nine km away from Hyderabad. The doctors certify that the rescued person has lost his memory. Eventually, he begins a new life with...                See full summary »

name: Ruz-e-sevom
summary_text: During the Iran-Iraq War, a disabled young woman is taken captive by Iraqi Baathist forces in Khuzestan Province (in Southern Iran). Her brother, along with his fellow combatants, tries to free his sister from the clutches of the enemy.

name: Paris, Wine and Romance
summary_text: Isabella, the owner of her family's Oregon winery, takes a big leap and enters a prestigious wine competition in Paris. There she meets her biggest competitor, Jacques, from one of the world's foremost winemaking families.

name: Film Geek
summary_text: The story of Scotty Pelk, a socially inept video store clerk who gets fired from his job and becomes a sensation as an online film critic.

name: In ascolto
summary_text: Estranged by the degree of corporate influence within the largest U.S. listening station in the world, an aging NSA officer defects and mounts a clandestine counter-listening station high in the Italian alps.

name: Amores Possíveis
summary_text: Fifteen year ago, Carlos went to the cinema to meet Júlia, his university colleague with whom he was in love. She never showed up. Carlos was left waiting in the lobby alone. While he waits...                See full summary »

name: City on Fire
summary_text: A pyromaniac, ex-employee of a city oil refinery creates an explosion at the facility which starts a chain-reaction of fires that engulf the entire city.

name: Die Legende von Paul und Paula
summary_text: Paul and Paula have had bad experiences with love: Paul is financially well off but has lost all affection for his wife, and Paula leads a troublesome life raising two children on her own. ...                See full summary »

name: Anatahan
summary_text: In June 1944, twelve Japanese seaman are stranded on an abandoned-and-forgotten island called Ana-ta-han for seven years.

name: Gates of the Night
summary_text: It's Paris in the winter after its liberation. A tramp who may also be Destiny predicts that Jean Diego will fall in love with a beautiful girl. That same evening, Jean meets Malou.

name: The Girl from Missouri
summary_text: Chorus girl Eadie is determined to marry a millionaire without sacrificing her virtue.

name: Four Christmases and a Wedding
summary_text: Chloe plans the first Christmas fair where she meets Evan, falls in love but he goes to Norway for his dream job. Second Xmas fair a year later, he brings a cute Swede. Third Xmas fair Chloe is dating Ted. How about fourth Xmas fair?
In 1920s England, a pianist enlists the help of a ghost whisperer to cleanse the unclean spirit that is haunting him.

name: Encounter
summary_text: A group of friends uncover an otherworldly object in a rural field, which they soon discover holds greater secrets than they could imagine.

name: O Vendedor de Sonhos
summary_text: A disillusioned psychologist tries to commit suicide until he strikes up a friendship with an unlikely savior who teaches him a new way of living.

name: Agnee
summary_text: Tanisha (Played by Mahiya Mahi) is a incognito serial killer in Thailand, She is known as the "Killer Queen", While She Tries to Take Revenge on An Underworld Don Ainal (Misha Shoudagor); ...                See full summary »

name: Ghost of Goodnight Lane
summary_text: When the staff inside a renovated film studio finds a co-worker dead one morning, the pieces of a forty year puzzle add up to an angry ghost who has let the last person step inside her house. But will they ever get out alive?

name: Oba: The Last Samurai
summary_text: During the end of World War 2, a group of Japanese soldiers fight on after US forces capture most of the island. They refuse to surrender and continue to resist after the Emperor surrenders.

name: Dino Time
summary_text: Three kids who travel back in time to 65 million years ago, where they are taken in by a dinosaur.

name: Merlin and the Book of Beasts
summary_text: Sorcerer Arkadian has taken over Camelot with a zoo of beasts from his magical book. King Arthur's daughter Avlynn asks Merlin to help her take back Camelot. She also has to find the sacred...                See full summary »

name: 20th Century Boys 3: Redemption
summary_text: It is 2017 and a resurrected Tomodachi rules the world. The prophecies of The New Book have all come true. Tomodachi predicts the end of the world through the spread of a lethal virus by ...                See full summary »

name: To fili tis... Zois
summary_text: Before his marriage in Milos an Aegean island, 30-year old Paschalis ends up accidentally in Sifnos, where he meets a mysterious photographer.Will he finally reach the church? And what is ...                See full summary »

name: Red Riding Hood
summary_text: Grandma is babysitting her two grandkids. The girl wants to go out, but grandma asks them to hear a story first. The kids accept if they can change aspects of the story such as replacing the wolf with a werewolf. Is there a catch?

name: Railroad Man
summary_text: The touching reminiscing of an elderly railroad-station manager is interrupted by the sudden appearance of some good-natured girls.

name: Corrupt
summary_text: After decades of terror, two deadly street gangs reach a delicate truce and young MJ (Silkk the Shocker) sees a way out of the hood once and for all. Only Corrupt (Ice-T) stands in MJ's way...                See full summary »

name: Morgiana
summary_text: Klara and Viktoria are sisters. Their father dies, leaving most of his property to Klara. When Klara becomes involved with a man that her sister loves, Viktoria begins to plot her murder.

name: Doomsday Gun
summary_text: How the brilliant Canadian munitions engineer, Dr. Gerald Bull, agreed to build a super-gun for Saddam Hussein in 1988, when the U.S. cut his funding for the experiment, and how it attracted the attention of several intelligence agencies.

name: Macken - Roy's & Roger's Bilservice
summary_text: Roy and Roger decide to close their gasstation for the summer, to try to find where, what and how their lost father is. Roger also falls in love and much more.

name: Jekyll & Hyde
summary_text: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.

name: Eddie Macon's Run
summary_text: A young man, harshly sentenced for a few minor infractions, escapes from a prison in Huntsville Texas and flees to Laredo, Texas, where he hopes to cross into Mexico for a reunion with his wife and small son.

name: Behind Convent Walls
summary_text: On the surface the women at the convent are your average nuns. However, what they get up to in their spare time is far from what you'd expect from nuns.

name: TNT Jackson
summary_text: A young karate expert searches for her brother's killer in Hong Kong.

name: Hickey & Boggs
summary_text: Bill Cosby and Robert Culp ("I Spy") are united again as private eyes in this Walter Hill-scripted "film noir." Searching for a missing girl, they find themselves involved with vicious criminals and precipitating a string of deaths.

name: The Philosopher's Stone
summary_text: An underpaid middle-aged clerk finds a 'parash pathar', a stone that changes iron to gold on touch.

name: The Kid from Brooklyn
summary_text: After a timid milkman knocks unconscious a boxing champion who was accosting his sister, he decides to take up boxing himself in order to impress a beautiful nightclub singer.

name: Fires Were Started
summary_text: A tale of firefighters in London during the Blitz.

name: Hope at Christmas
summary_text: Divorced Sydney inherits a house from her grandma. Seeing it with her 8 y.o. daughter, she stops at the bookstore and meets a single teacher there. She ends up helping out there for the Christmas season.

name: General Commander
summary_text: GRS operative Jake Alexander and his team of young recruits go after the most dangerous and notorious criminals with the help of a Hong Kong billionaire.

name: Denmark
summary_text: A down-on-his-luck Welshman travels across Europe with one crazy goal: to get himself arrested and sent to a Danish prison where the beds are warm and the water is hot.

name: Filly Brown
summary_text: A promising hip-hop rhymer from Los Angeles finds herself in a gray area when a record producer offers her a compromising shot at stardom.

name: I Like
summary_text: A high school student named Yu has a crush on one of her classmates, Yosuke. The boy spends most of his time sitting outside and playing his guitar, and Yu sits nearby and listens. One day,...                See full summary »

name: OrAngeLove
summary_text: (Russian with English subtitles) A stunningly beautiful story of two young lovers drawn by chance into a passionate and destructive romance.

name: Third Man Out
summary_text: A gay detective is hired to find who has been been threatening a notorious member of the gay community noted for outing people.

name: Die Wilden Kerle 2
summary_text: An unsupervised junior soccer team loses their ace player to the leader of a rival gang en route to qualifying to play against the nation team and must have her back.
